titlestmt.titleproper: Trenton Community School of Religious Education records 1923-1928
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Trenton Community School of Religious Education records

bioghist.p: The Trenton Community School of Religious Education opened in 1919. Its object was to recruit and train a "more adequate and intelligent leadership for our Church Schools and Christian organizations." The first class graduated in 1922.

scopecontent.p: This is a scrapbook kept by the Alumni Association of the Trenton Community School of Religious Education. The scrapbook includes: minutes and constitution; commencement programs; photographs; lists of graduates; and related records, 1923-1928.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
